data.title: StarGuard Elite
data.text:
Wess Long

President

Wess oversees all aspects of the company, with primary focus on staying active throughout the industry, leading product development, establishing key partnerships, and most importantly supporting the SGE team. Prior to SGE, Wess held a number of senior leadership positions for some of the world's leading waterparks and resorts.

Jessica Gray

Director of Business Development

Jessica oversees a wide variety of responsibilities, however her primary focus is assisting prospective clients, onboarding new clients, and providing direction to SGE's accounting team. Jessica also assists with regulatory compliance nationwide. Prior to SGE, Jessica had over 15 years working as a Parks & Recreation aquatics professional.

Stanton "SJ" Idel

Director of Training

In his role, SJ is responsible for managing all aspects of the StarGuard Instructor Development program, as well as leading the enhancements of existing and development of new training programs. Prior to SGE, SJ had over 20 years working in Parks & Recreation and as an aquatic safety consultant.

Bruce Wright

Client Partner, International Operations

Based in Florida, Bruce provides client support to SGE's international clients in 27 countries, including resorts, waterparks, private destinations, cruise lines, and more. Bruce also manages special projects for SGE, including large client rollouts. Prior to SGE, Bruce had over 20 years working throughout aquatics in waterparks, resorts, and pool management companies.

Nick Hawco

Client Partner, Western USA

Based in Arizona, Nick provides client support to SGE's clients located in the Western United States. Nick also manages all aspects of SGE's amazing CAMP Conferences. Prior to SGE, Nick had almost 15 years working in Parks & Recreation and was also a high school teacher.

Lea Lampe

Client Partner, Eastern USA

Based in New Jersey, Lea provides client support to SGE's clients located in the Eastern United States. Lea also manages all aspects of SGE's social media and assists with new client onboarding. Prior to SGE, Lea worked in waterparks and also several years as a SGE aquatic safety consultant performing audits and training courses worldwide.

Diamante "Dia" Hornyak

Client Partner, Southern Midwest

Based in Colorado, Dia provides client support to SGE's clients located throughout the Southern Midwest of the United States. Prior to joining SGE, Dia worked in both Parks & Recreation and waterpark operations, as well as a SGE aquatic safety consultant performing audits and training courses.

Chris Drummond

Safety Specialist

Based in Virginia, Chris provides a wide variety of operational services and client support. Prior to joining SGE, Chris has worked in Parks & Recreation, as well as a SGE aquatic safety consultant performing audits and training courses worldwide.

Dr. Justin Sempsrott

Medical Director

Dr. Sempsrott is full-time emergency medicine doctor and also the Medical Director for StarGuard ELITE and the International Surf Lifesaving Association. He is also a founding member of both the non-profit Lifeguards Without Borders and the International Drowning Researchers Alliance. Dr. Sempsrott began his career as a surf lifesaver in Jacksonville Beach, Florida prior to attending medical school to become a physician. Dr. Sempsrott is one of the world's leading experts on drowning and aquatic lifesaving.

Dr. Seth Hawkins

Medical Director

Dr. Hawkins is an emergency medicine doctor, writer, anthropologist, and organizational innovator. For over 10 years Dr. Hawkins has served as a Medical Director for both StarGuard ELITE and Starfish Aquatics Institute. Dr. Hawkins has made notable contributions to the fields of wilderness medicine, Emergency Medical Services (EMS), and medical humanities. For SGE, Dr. Hawkins has been instrumental for adapting the most current science for spinal injury care and prevention of drowning-related injuries.

Jason Bitzer

Surf Park Specialist

Jason is a career waterman that includes being a professional water sports athlete and a Lifeguard on the North Shore of Oahu Hawaii. During his field days as a Lifeguard, Jason received a Presidential Lifesaving Merit award and Honolulu Mayoral award for lives saved in the line of duty. Jason is often recruited as a large event safety commander for corporate sporting and entertainment, including professional surf events. With his unique expertise in lifesaving & surfing, Jason has also been recruited to support the booming surf park industry where he has consulted on projects such as Palm Springs Surf Club and The Lineup at Wai Kai.
